evidence.text:
Person A: ) Thank you young man, thank you. What is your name?
Person A: Nice to know I can count on somebody round here, Turner.

Person A: When's the last time you had family visit, Turner?
Person B: ...They... well, my kin, my parents, I mean my ma, she...

Person A: Well I came all this way. I can't hug Elwood, so you'll have to do.
Person A: I'll expect it the next time, Turner. The world needs strong young men like you.
